events.message: I am submitting a claim after my car was involved in a collision at the intersection downtown last week.
The claim has been reviewed and classified under Auto Accident due to the vehicle collision reported.
An agent from the auto claims department has been assigned to your case to assist with the process.
Your claim has been officially acknowledged by our team; we are now preparing the next steps.
Please submit photos of the damaged vehicle, police report, and your driverâ€™s license for further processing.
All requested documents including accident photos and police report have been provided as per instructions.
Our investigation team has begun reviewing the submitted evidence to determine fault and damages.
The investigation into the circumstances of your car accident has been completed with all findings documented.
A settlement proposal has been prepared based on the assessed damages and liability established in your claim.
We have received your feedback regarding the settlement offer and your experience during the claim process.
Your claim has been approved following acceptance of the settlement offer and confirmation of all criteria.
The settlement payment has been processed and issued to your bank account as per the approved claim.
This claim is now closed following successful payment issuance and resolution of all aspects of the accident.
The claim files have been archived in the system for record-keeping and future reference purposes.
